mapper.select: SELECT P2.CONSULTING_CASE_ID, P2.MEMBER_ID, P2.CASE_TITLE, P2.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_ID, P2.LAWYER_ID, P2.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_CONTENT, P2.CREATE_DATE, P2.UPDATE_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, P1.CONSULTING_CASE_ID, P1.MEMBER_ID, P1.CASE_TITLE, P1.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_ID, P1.LAWYER_ID, P1.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_CONTENT, P1.CREATE_DATE, P1.UPDATE_DATE FROM (SELECT CC.CONSULTING_CASE_ID, CC.MEMBER_ID, CC.CASE_TITLE, CCR.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_ID, CCR.LAWYER_ID, CCR.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_CONTENT, CCR.CREATE_DATE, CCR.UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_CONSULTING_CASE CC JOIN TBL_CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY CCR ON CC.CONSULTING_CASE_ID = CCR.CONSULTING_CASE_ID WHERE CCR.LAWYER_ID = #{lawyerId} ORDER BY CCR.CONSULTING_CASE_REPLY_ID DESC) P1 ) P2 WHERE P2.R IN (1, 2, 3)

SELECT R.RESERVATION_ID, R.CONSULTING_TYPE, R.LAWYER_ID, R.MEMBER_ID, CR.CONSULTING_REVIEW_ID, CR.FIELD_ID, CR.REVIEW_TITLE, CR.REVIEW_CONTENT, CR.CREATE_DATE, F.FIELD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_RESERVATION R JOIN TBL_CONSULTING_REVIEW CR ON R.RESERVATION_ID = CR.RESERVATION_ID JOIN TBL_FIELD F ON CR.FIELD_ID = F.FIELD_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE R.LAWYER_ID = #{lawyerId} ORDER BY CR.CONSULTING_REVIEW_ID DESC

SELECT P2.RESERVATION_ID, P2.CONSULTING_TYPE, P2.LAWYER_ID, P2.MEMBER_ID, P2.CONSULTING_REVIEW_ID, P2.FIELD_ID, P2.REVIEW_TITLE, P2.REVIEW_CONTENT, P2.CREATE_DATE, P2.FIELD_TITLE, P2.MEMBER_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, P1.RESERVATION_ID, P1.CONSULTING_TYPE, P1.LAWYER_ID, P1.MEMBER_ID, P1.CONSULTING_REVIEW_ID, P1.FIELD_ID, P1.REVIEW_TITLE, P1.REVIEW_CONTENT, P1.CREATE_DATE, P1.FIELD_TITLE, P1.MEMBER_NAME FROM (SELECT R.RESERVATION_ID, R.CONSULTING_TYPE, R.LAWYER_ID, R.MEMBER_ID, CR.CONSULTING_REVIEW_ID, CR.FIELD_ID, CR.REVIEW_TITLE, CR.REVIEW_CONTENT, CR.CREATE_DATE, F.FIELD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_RESERVATION R JOIN TBL_CONSULTING_REVIEW CR ON R.RESERVATION_ID = CR.RESERVATION_ID JOIN TBL_FIELD F ON CR.FIELD_ID = F.FIELD_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE R.LAWYER_ID = #{lawyerId} ORDER BY CR.CONSULTING_REVIEW_ID DESC) P1
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pagination.endRow} ) P2 WHERE P2.R >= #{pagination.startRow}

SELECT AVG(CALL_PRICE) callPriceAverage, AVG(VIDEO_PRICE) videoPriceAverage, AVG(VISIT_PRICE) visitPriceAverage, COUNT(CALL_PRICE) callPriceCount, COUNT(VIDEO_PRICE) videoPriceCount, COUNT(VISIT_PRICE) visitPriceCount, MAX(CALL_PRICE) callPriceMax, MIN(CALL_PRICE) callPriceMin, MAX(VIDEO_PRICE) videoPriceMax, MIN(VIDEO_PRICE) videoPriceMin, MAX(VISIT_PRICE) visitPriceMax, MIN(VISIT_PRICE) visitPriceMin FROM TBL_LAWYER WHERE CALL_PRICE != 0 AND VIDEO_PRICE != 0 AND VISIT_PRICE != 0

SELECT P2.SOLUTION_CASE_ID, P2.SOLUTION_CASE_TITLE, P2.SOLUTION_CASE_CONTENT, P2.SENTENCE_RESULT, P2.CREATE_DATE, P2.LAWYER_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, P1.SOLUTION_CASE_ID, P1.SOLUTION_CASE_TITLE, P1.SOLUTION_CASE_CONTENT, P1.SENTENCE_RESULT, P1.CREATE_DATE, P1.LAWYER_ID FROM (SELECT SOLUTION_CASE_ID, SOLUTION_CASE_TITLE, SOLUTION_CASE_CONTENT, SENTENCE_RESULT, CREATE_DATE, LAWYER_ID FROM TBL_SOLUTION_CASE WHERE LAWYER_ID = #{lawyerId} ORDER BY SOLUTION_CASE_ID DESC) P1 ) P2 WHERE P2.R IN (1, 2, 3)

SELECT P2.LEGAL_GUIDE_ID, P2.LEGAL_GUIDE_TITLE, P2.LEGAL_GUIDE_CONTENT, P2.CREATE_DATE, P2.LAWYER_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, P1.LEGAL_GUIDE_ID, P1.LEGAL_GUIDE_TITLE, P1.LEGAL_GUIDE_CONTENT, P1.CREATE_DATE, P1.LAWYER_ID FROM (SELECT LEGAL_GUIDE_ID, LEGAL_GUIDE_TITLE, LEGAL_GUIDE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, LAWYER_ID FROM TBL_LEGAL_GUIDE WHERE LAWYER_ID = #{lawyerId} ORDER BY LEGAL_GUIDE_ID DESC) P1 ) P2 WHERE P2.R IN (1, 2, 3)
